dc_title_s: Assessment Areas (Single Family) City of Madison, WI 2023
dc_description_s: This data represents single-family assessment areas in the City of Madison, Wisconsin in 2023. [Assessment areas are typically defined by neighborhood boundaries based on their original plats. The housing stock within each assessment area will have similar construction years and styles (ex. Nakoma Neighborhood, Veridian neighborhood). The Assessorâ€™s Office analyzes market data within each assessment area to determine trends.]
uw_supplemental_s: This is an archived copy of the data held at UW-Madison. For access to the most current data, please visit: [https://data-cityofmadison.opendata.arcgis.com/]
